main.title: Technology that Inspires Confidence
main.description: Delivering clarity and efficiency through innovative tools and expertise

description.title: Technology that solves real business problems.
description.text: Harmony Technologies provides independent solutions in data analytics, event management, and custom development, designed to match your specific needs. Each product works on its own, so you only invest in what truly matters to your business.

projects.title: Our work is built around three key directions

titles: Search Anywhere Framework — platform that unifies all data for instant search and analytics
Eventico — Online platform for effortless event management
descriptions: Harmony Technology is the official distributor and trusted partner
Clients run and manage their events simply
Harmony Technology builds custom websites and automation systems tailored to your business needs — from processes to customer platforms, built to scale

contacts.title: Let’s Build Together
contacts.description: Tell us about your project — whether it’s data, events, or custom development. Our team will help you find the right solution

saf.title: search anywhere framework
saf.description: Universal platform for IT operations, cybersecurity, and business analytics. Eliminate reindexing, reduce costs, and unlock real-time insights

descriptions: instant search across Elastic, OpenSearch, Hadoop, ClickHouse, and SQL-like DBs without reindexing
connect IT, security, and business modules, expanding as your needs grow
share knowledge with docs and diagrams, and build dashboards from simple metrics to advanced charts
model dependencies, detect anomalies, and uncover hidden trends
extend SAF language, integrate APIs, and automate data transformations
